entry.source: There is a small bar at the far end of{F801}{F804,5}Shinjuku Golden Gai.{F804,0} I'd like you to take{F801}a {F804,5}picture{F804,0} of this bar for me. I'm old now,{F801}but I used to run that bar, and before Tokyo{F801}was sealed off, all the boys used to love me.{F801}Once you have the picture, please bring it{F801}to me under Shinjuku.{F801}
